metadata.description:
1st Book on the Blockchain.

Rare Limited Edition.

Only 100 Minted.

It was always my intention to preserve this amazing book by translating and adapting it. I was successful and became a #1 best seller. I am now adding this book to the blockchain to keep it alive forever with my name attached.

Meditations is a series of personal writings by Marcus Aurelius, Roman Emperor from 161 to 180 AD, recording his private notes to himself and ideas on Stoic philosophy.

★ Marcus Aurelius wrote the 12 books of the Meditations as a source for his own guidance and self-improvement.

★ These books have been carefully adapted into Modern English to allow for easy reading. ✓

ENJOY

metadata.subtitle: 1st Book on the Blockchain
